With that lead, you made your way to the Shattered Teeth, made friends with an older tortoise woman who had helped Keyleth through her grief many years ago, who led you on the path to the island of Kalutha. →
You decided the best route to take to get there involved summoning a ghost ship and parleying with its captain. →
